original.question: I have attended 51 classes out of 75, and each day 4 classes happen, how many days do I have to attend more to make my attendance more than 75 percent?

abstract.question: How many more days of classes must I attend to achieve an attendance rate above 75 percent?

detailed.question: If I have already attended 51 out of 75 classes, with 4 classes scheduled each day, how many additional days of perfect attendance are required to exceed a 75 percent attendance rate?
